item.title: LiveCD
item.description: LiveCD Install LiveCD 1dd status=progress if=livecd.iso of=/dev/sdaX bs=512 2fdisk ... # TODO: fix disk size 3cryptsetup luksFormt /dev/sdaX 4cryptsetup open persistence /dev/sdaX 5mkfs.ext4 -L persistence /dev/mapper/persistence 6mount /dev/mapper/persistence /mnt/livecd 7echo "/ union" > /mnt/livecd/persistence.conf 8umount /dev/mapper/persistence 9cryptsetup close persistence backup dick images 1$ fdisk -l 2$ blkid 3$ dd status=progress bs=512 if=/dev/sda1 | gzip -nc -6 > backup.img.gz 4# status 5# bs 6# if 参考资料 https://www.kali.org/downloads/ https://www.kali.org/docs/usb/kali-linux-live-usb-install-linux/
